title: Miscellany
author: Ḥayim ben Yitsḥaḳ ben Eliyah, of Cordova
description: Contents: Ḥayim ben Yitsḥaḳ ben Eliyah of Cordova, Meʿulefet sapirim (Commentary on the difficult words of the Targum of Ezekiel) (ff. 1-88). David Kimhi, Perush maʿaseh merkavah (ff. 88-96). David Kimhi's and Rashi's commentaries on the Minor Prophets (ff. 97-184). David Kimhi's and Rashi's commentaries on Chronicles (ff. 185-267). Supplementary notes and liturgical pieces (ff. 268-276).
